A description of the changes proposed in the pull request.

- 🐞 Bug 
- 🚀 Feature
- 🛠 Refactoring / Updates

### Backlog

A reference to a related issue in JIRA. 

- Resolves: WANTIC-XXX

All additional infos that could help to review the PR.

- Screenshots
- Hints, ...
